text: Disney's Mulan is a 1998 action video game based on the Disney film Mulan, and released on the Game Boy. It is a part of the Mulan franchise. The action game is published by THQ and developed by Tiertex Design Studios.http://au.ign.com/games/mulan/gb-5472 It was released on Oct 19, 1998. == References == Category:1998 video games Category:Action video games Category:Mulan (franchise) Category:Game Boy games Category:THQ games Category:Video games developed in the United Kingdom
title: Mulan (video game)
